diff_hunk:
@@ -19,6 +19,7 @@ XLINT_OPTS = [
     "-Xlint:-serial",
     "-Xlint:-try",
     "-Xlint:-classfile", # see b/32750402, go/javac-warnings#classfile
+    "-Xlint:-deprecation", # for exposing deprecated ops
body:
For now, let's keep it simple and do away with deprecated ones.
Once we commit to stability, we can reconsider (and remove the warnings then, better to keep them on as long as possible than preemptively disabling them)
